name: punchclock-api-client-generator
description: TypeScript client generator for PunchClock API

scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:spec && npm run generate:nswag && npm run generate:openapi && npm run generate:kiota
scripts.install-tools: npm install -g @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli && dotnet tool install -g NSwag.ConsoleCore && dotnet tool install -g Microsoft.OpenApi.Kiota
